task.title: How to subtract numbers
task.shortdesc: Here you will find instructions about using the subtraction feature of calculator application.

taskbody.prereq: To successfully subtract numbers, you must know what is subtraction.
taskbody.result: The result from subtraction is displayed.
taskbody.example:
You want to subtract 2 from 3. The equation will look like 3-2=1. You enter 3. Press minus button. Enter 2. Press equals button.
The result 1 appears on the screen.
